solution.text:
Percentage of apples = (Number of apples/ Total number of apples and oranges) x 100.
Percentage of apples = (Ratio of apples/ ratio of apples + ratio of oranges) x 100
Hence, Percentage = (_{j}_/(_{j}_+_{{10-j}}_)) x100
\( \Rightarrow \) Therefore the Percentage of Apples = _{{j*10}}_ %

content.text: The percentage of apples, if ratio of apples to oranges is _{j}_: _{{10-j}}_.
